akas: Shimmer és Shine, a dzsinn testvérek Hungary
akas from release info: Shimmer és Shine, a dzsinn testvérek Hungary

-1.title: Oceans Collide
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Sweetest Thing
1.plot: When Leah wishes for help making cupcakes for a bake sale, she and the genies find themselves stuck with a giant birthday cake, some farm animals, and a river of cupcake batter. How will Leah finish without any wishes left?

2.title: Genie Treehouse
2.plot: Leah and Zac try building a treehouse but find themselves in over their heads. Leah asks her genies for a treehouse and is thrown for a loop when Shimmer and Shine turn her house into a house of trees!

3.title: Lights! Camera! Genies!
3.plot: Leah and Zac are excited to watch their favorite movie, but Leah's popcorn burns and the movie won't play. Leah asks Shimmer and Shine for some movie magic help, but they accidentally wish the movie to life!

4.title: What a Pig Mess
4.plot: When Leah's party food accidentally gets run over by Zac, Leah needs to figure out what else to bring fast. Leah asks her genies for more Pigs in a Blanket, but the genies give her real pigs wrapped in a blanket!

5.title: Abaca-Genie
5.plot: Leah notices Zac the Magician's magic tricks aren't going well, so she calls on her genies for some real magic assistance. But Shimmer and Shine aren't getting the tricks right either, and the girls have a magical mess to fix!

6.title: Ahoy, Genies!
6.plot: When Leah's bucket full of beach treasures floats into the vast ocean, Leah summons Shimmer and Shine to help her retrieve the loot.

7.title: Dino-Might!
7.plot: After searching endlessly for Zac's missing dinosaur toy, Leah asks her genies to wish up a replacement and gets stuck with a real live Apatosaurus! Leah, Shimmer, and Shine have to figure out a way to fix this behemoth mistake.

8.title: A Very Genie Halloweenie
8.plot: It's Halloween, and Leah invites her genies over to join the fun. Leah makes a wish to make Zac's house look haunted, but the genies turn it into a real haunted house, with a real Frankenstein! It's a spooktacular adventure!

9.title: Backyard Ballet
9.plot: While Leah and Zac are trying to re-enact their new favorite ballet, Leah makes a wish to be a ballerina like the Swan Queen.

10.title: Game On
10.plot: Leah and Zac save up for months to get the big prize at the arcade, but the ticket counting machine malfunctions.

11.title: Santa's Little Genies
11.plot: When Leah accidentally wishes Santa to a tropical island and the elves asleep, the girls must deliver presents and save Christmas.

12.title: Spaceship Wrecked
12.plot: When Leah wishes that she were able to talk to an alien, Shimmer and Shine poof one into her backyard.

13.title: Happy Wishaversary
13.plot: It's time for Shimmer, Shine and Leah to their Wishaversary. Leah's Thirilld to Celebrate her Friendship with her favorite genies.

14.title: Sleep-Over Party
14.plot: Leah invites Shimmer and Shine over for their very sleepover party, but the genies' wish granting turns it into a dance party ... and the girls can't stop dancing!

15.title: Dream Dollhouse
15.plot: When Leah wishes for more doll friends for her genies to play with in her new dollhouse, she didn't mean for the genies to shrink themselves down to doll-size!

16.title: Gone Bowlin
16.plot: Leah and Zac are pumped for day of bowling! But Leah is having a tough time trying to knock down a single pin, so she calls on Shimmer and Shine to lend a little genie magic to improve her game.

17.title: The Great Skate Mistake
17.plot: Leah's Skateboard breaks while practicing for the big skateboard competition, so she asks Shimmer And Shine For A New BOARD!

18.title: Escape Goat
18.plot: A goat escapes and Leah and her genies follow it.

19.title: The First Wish
19.plot: After making a silly wish, Leah and the genies try to hide a polka-dotted elephant from her friend Zac.

1.title: Welcome to Zahramay Falls
1.plot: Shimmer and Shine are so thrilled to receive the Green Burst Gem from Princess Samira that when they visit Leah, they take the gem along to show it to her.

2.title: All Bottled Up/Zoom Zahramay
2.plot: Shimmer and Shine open a super sparkly bottle at the market... and get sucked into it! It's a trap, set by Zeta. And since they're stuck inside, they can't grant wishes!

4.title: Mermaid Mayhem/Snow Place We'd Rather Be
4.plot: When Shimmer and Shine tell Leah that mermaids live in Zahramay Falls, Leah wishes that they could be mermaids too. Princess Samira sends Leah and the genies to find a snowflake gem hidden inside an ice palace.

5.title: Flying Flour
5.plot: Shimmer, Shine and Leah plan to bake a super fun treat: flying cookies.

6.title: Lost and Found/Freeze-amay Falls
6.plot: When Zeta accidentally transports Tala to her lair, the girls set out to rescue her. The girls must help an ice genie when Zeta steals her ice gem necklace.

7.title: Bling, Bling/Staffinated
7.plot: When Zeta steals Samira's necklace and staff and turns everyone into chickens, Shimmer, Shine and Leah set out to stop her.

8.title: Dragon Pox/Lightning in a Bottle
8.plot: Nazboo gets sick with Dragon Pox, and Leah, Shimmer, and Shine go on an adventure to find the magical cure. The girls meet a Lightning Genie and help him catch his runaway lightning bolt before it causes any trouble.

9.title: Size of the Beholder/Zoomicorn Toss
9.plot: Zeta uses a magical gem to shrink everything in Zahramay Falls, including Leah, Shimmer, and Shine! Leah, Zac, Zeta, and the genies compete in the most fun sport in Zahramay Falls: Zoomicorn Toss.

10.title: Double Trouble/Zany Ziffilon
10.plot: Leah and the genies discover a magical gem that makes two of everything, including Zeta. Zac wishes for a pet Ziffilon for Kaz.

11.title: Volcano Drain-o/Cleanie Genies
11.plot: When Zeta and Nazboo suck all the glitter out of a volcano, the girls must try to stop them; Zeta steals Leah, Shimmer and Shine's magical gem, enchanting cleaning supplies.

12.title: Now You See Her/Untamed Talent
12.plot: Leah makes friends with a fox that can turn invisible. Tala, Nahal and Parisa perform in a talent show as Zeta and Nazboo try to steal the show.

13.title: The Crystal Queen/The Glob
13.plot: When Zeta traps Samira in a magical cave, the girls seek the help of Samira's mentor. The girls accidentally create a fun, sticky glob of candy who's curious about everything.

14.title: Pet Bedroom/Boom Zahra-Mom
14.plot: Leah babysits the rambunctious pets as Shimmer and Shine secretly build them new, fun bedrooms. When a baby bird mistakes Zeta for its mom, the girls must help her return it to its nest.

15.title: Masquerade Charade/The Silent Treatment
15.plot: Leah, Shimmer, and Shine attend a party at Samira's palace. Zeta crashes the party pretending to be Samira. Zeta uses a potion to swap Leah's voice with a bird's. Will Shimmer and Shine understand Leah's tweets?

16.title: Frosty Fun/Zeta in Training
16.plot: Little ice sprites use Shimmer and Shine's palace for their games, turning it into a winter wonderland Zeta uses a potion to swap Leah's voice with a bird's. Will Shimmer and Shine understand Leah's tweets?

17.title: Potion Control/Feel Better
17.plot: When the girls accidentally cause Nazboo to inflate like a balloon, Zeta must help them reverse the spell. A sneezing bug buzzes through Zahramay Falls, causing all the genies to create hilarious magic when they sneeze.

18.title: Trick or Treasure/Easy as Pie
18.plot: The girls visit Nila the mermaid for an underwater treasure hunt. Easy as Pie: Zeta uses a potion to make Zac do everything she says. Can Kaz and the girls stop Zeta before it's too late?

19.title: Bungle in the Jungle/The Mysterious Tower
19.plot: Zeta traps the girls in an ancient temple where they must work together to escape. Zac, Kaz, and the girls explore a mysterious tower and find a necklace that can turn you into a monster.

20.title: The Pirate Game
20.plot: Little ice sprites use Shimmer and Shine's palace for their games, turning it into a winter wonderland.

30.title: Starry Night Sleepover/Wild Carpet Chase
30.plot: Shimmer, Shine and Leah must retrieve their stolen wishing star from Zeta before she makes a wish. Zeta manages to get her hands on Zac's new carpet.

0.title: Brave-ish/Nazboo's Magic Kazoo
0.plot: When Kaz worries he's not brave enough, he adventures with the kids to find a Bravery Gem to help him. Nazboo finds a kazoo that makes magic stronger when you play it, including Zeta's.

1.title: Underground Bound/Wishy Washy Genie
1.plot: As the girls search for Leah's lost necklace, an underground creature finds it and begins making wishest. After Zac wishes to stay in Zahramay Falls forever, the kids search for a powerful genie to reverse the wish.

2.title: Genie for a Day/Zac the Clueless Detective
2.plot: When Leah wishes to be a genie for the day, Zeta uses magic to have Leah grant her wishes. When Zac thinks the girls are missing, he plays detective and goes on the search with Kaz.

3.title: Carpet Troubles/Dragon Tales
3.plot: The girls visit the carpet vendor to fix their carpet, while Zeta and Nazboo plan to take some magic thread. Zeta and Nazboo tell the girls the fun story of how they first met, but their facts don't quite match up.

4.title: Samira and Zeta/The Zeta Touch
4.plot: Samira tells the girls the story of how she and Zeta first met - and how they were once best friends. The girls must stop Zeta when she takes a scepter that gives her the power to grow magical vines and gems.

5.title: Nazboo's Family Reunion/The Darpoppy
5.plot: When Nazboo's siblings come to visit, Zeta recruits them to help take the girls' gems when they're not home. When Zac wishes himself into the forest to find a mythical creature, Kaz and the girls adventure to find him.

6.title: Rainbow Zahramay
6.plot: When the magical rainbow water goes out of balance, Samira sends the girls through the waterfall to a new world - Rainbow Zahramay. There, they meet a Waterfall Genie who can help them bring balance to the water.

7.title: Hairdos and Don'ts/Flower Power
7.plot: The girls meet a genie with the power to change hairstyles, but Zeta's determined to take the power for herself. The girls travel to a magic garden, where they meet a Flitter Genie and shrink down to her size to explore.

8.title: Dance Magic
8.plot: Samira takes the girls to learn dance magic from an instructor. But when Zeta takes the instructor's magic shoes and uses them to try taking over Zahramay Falls, the girls must use the dances they learned to stop her.

9.title: Hounded/The Sorceress' Apprentice
9.plot: Zac uses a wish to bring his dog Rocket to Zahramay Falls - but the genies mistake him for a monster.After using magic to make Zac forget who he is, Zeta trains him as her apprentice and tries teaching him potions.

10.title: Abracanope/Treehouse Retreat
10.plot: The girls befriend a cute creature, only to find out that their magic doesn't work when it's nearby. Zeta's relaxing night at the treehouse is halted when the girls also show up, so she tries to scare them away.

12.title: All That Glitters/Grab That Gem!
12.plot: Zeta steals the amazing Glitter Genie's staff. If the girls don't get it back in time, the Glitter Genie's palace will disappear! When the girls discover a blank gem, they take it to meet the Gem Princess who gives each gem its power.

13.title: Electric Genies/Jackpot!
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Nila Out of Water/I Dream of Zeta
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: Leah Goes to School
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: A Pirate Genie's Life for Me/Wacky Wishes
20.plot: The girls join Zora, the Pirate Genie, on an adventure to find a magical Rainbow Pearl to power her ship.

1.title: Welcome to Zahramay Skies
1.plot: Shimmer, Shine, and Leah travel to a magical new land called Zahramay Skies and meet Adara, the Stardust Princess.

2.title: Pets to the Rescue/Runaway Rainbow
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: The Zahra-Star/Lightning Strikes Twice
3.plot: Shimmer and Zahrora accidentally cause some trouble when they visit a new part of Zahramay Skies called Zahraconia.

4.title: Rainbows to the Rescue/Daydreams come True
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Zahracorn Salon/Zahracorn Tickles
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Genie Babies/Zeta Sleeps Over
8.plot: Zeta and Nazboo have to take care of Shimmer, Shine, and Leah when a potion mishap turns them into little babies.

10.title: Buddies in a Bottle/The Gem Hunt
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Snow Time to Spare/Pet Games
13.plot: The girls help Layla, the Ice Genie, create fun snow decorations for the upcoming Frosty Fun Festival.The kids hold a fun sports competition for their pets, Nazboo, and his siblings.

17.title: The Sky Garden/The Dragon Zahracorn
17.plot:

imdb.plot outline: Follows the magical adventures of genie twin sisters Shimmer and Shine and their human best friend Leah, who, when needing help with various dilemmas, is granted three wishes after summoning the genies with a rub of her oil lamp pendant necklace.
imdb.title: Shimmer and Shine
plot: Follows the magical adventures of fraternal twin genies, _Shimmer and Shine_ (qv), who unintentionally create chaos while attempting to grant wishes for their human best friend, Leah.::Anonymous

Follows the magical adventures of genie twin sisters _Shimmer and Shine_ (qv) and their human best friend Leah, who, when needing help with various dilemmas, is granted three wishes after summoning the genies with a rub of her oil lamp pendant necklace.::Anonymous
